colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING 'DI NA BCA' YIG ZHIG CES KYANG DGOS ZHES DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA'I T'A BLA MA NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS HUN TSA PI LIG THU GE BSKOS DKON MCHOG DBANG @014B 'PHEL DGE BSKOS DON 'GRUB RNAMS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA'I PHAN BDE LEGS BSHAD GLING GI BCA' YIG DANG, RJE BTZUN BLA MA DAM RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I TSOGS GTAM GYI TSUL DU BKA' STZAL BA'I GSUNG DANG, RTA TSAG RJE DRUNG RIN PO CHE'I MDZAD PA'I DGA' LDAN BRTAN BZHUGS CHOS 'KHOR GLING GI BCA' YIG 'DI RNAMS LA GZHI BYAS NAS ZHABS DRUNG MING 'DZIN PA SU MA TI PRADZNY'AS HOR ZLA BCU PA'I TSE DKAR PHYOGS KYI TSES DGE BAR BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI THA KHE LA CHI TSE RING RDO RJES SO,, ,,)
